content.en: Epitope prediction: Scientists are using algorithms to predict and identify specific molecules, called epitopes, that can stimulate the immune system to fight cancer. These algorithms, such as TEPITOPE and HLA-binding prediction algorithms, are able to identify the most effective epitopes for cancer immunotherapy. By using these algorithms, researchers hope to develop targeted treatments that can induce a strong immune response against cancer cells.
content.da: Epitope-prediktion: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at forudsige og identificere specifikke molekyler, kaldet epitoper, der kan stimulere immunsystemet til at bekæmpe kræft. Disse algoritmer, såsom TEPITOPE og HLA-bindingsprediktionsalgoritmer, er i stand til at identificere de mest effektive epitoper til kræftimmunterapi. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at udvikle målrettede behandlinger, der kan inducere en stærk immunrespons mod kræftceller.
